name: Echo Night 2: The Lord of Nightmares
name_original: Echo Night 2: The Lord of Nightmares
description:
Echo Night #2: Nemuri no Shihaisha (エコーナイト#2 眠りの支配者) is a Survival Horror video game published by From Liquid Mirror Software, FromSoftware released on August 5th, 1999 for the Sony PlayStation.
Originally Scheduled for Release in the US, at some Point the Game was Canceled and would Never see a Release Outside of Japan. However thanks to the Efforts of some Translators everyone can now enjoy the Story of Echo Night 2
